title: ULGUSAARLANE ⟩ Kaks külalist korraga - mis neid ühendab?
description: Seekordses ulgusaarlaste saates on külalisi koguni kaks - Katrin Laikre ja Indrek Vaher. Ühendab neid pere-elu Harjumaal Kangru külas aga ka ühine jooksuhuvi - mõlemad on pannud ennast proovile maailma kõige mainekamatel ja raskematel maratonidel pea kõigis maailmajagudes, viimati Jaapanis. Mis, kus ja kuidas, uuris Erki Berends.
title_translated: Ulgasaar⟩ Two guests at a time - what connects them?
description_translated: This time there are as many as two guests - Katrin Laikre and Indrek Vaher. But they also combine them in Kangru village, Harju County, in a common run - both of them have tested themselves in the world's most prestigious and heavier marathons in almost all continents, most recently in Japan. What, where and how, Erki Berends explored.

description: Pärast seda, kui e-tiigrist sai kodukass, on meil vaja uut suurt narratiivi, millesse me ka ise usuksime. Eesti on nagu Tommy Cash – ebaideaalne –, kuid selles on tugev potentsiaal olla eristuv ja kõnekas bränd, kirjutab Kristiina Saks arvamuskonkursile Edukas Eesti saadetud artiklis.
title_translated: Kristiina Saks⟩ Estonia cannot be anything less than Tommy Cash
description_translated: After E-Tiger became a domestic cat, we need a new large narrative that we would believe in. Estonia is like Tommy Cash - unhooked - but it has a strong potential to be a distinctive and eloquent brand, writes Kristiina Saks in an article sent to a successful Estonian article.

title: UEFA juhatusse valitud Aivar Pohlak: „Ma ei mõtle sellele, mida Klavan presidendiks valimise korral teeb, sest see võimalus pole kuigi suur.“
description: Eesti jalgpalli liidu president Aivar Pohlak valiti UEFA kongressil Belgradis Euroopa jalgpallielu ohjava organisatsiooni juhatusse. Ta on ses ametis läbi aegade esimene eestlane.
title_translated: Aivar Pohlak, elected to the UEFA Board: "I don't think about what Klavan does when he was elected president, because this opportunity is not very great."
description_translated: Aivar Pohlak, President of the Estonian Football Association, was elected at the UEFA congress to the board of the European Football Life Organization in Belgrade. He is the first Estonian in this office.

title: POLE HAMASIGA RAHUL: Gazas toimusid möödunud nädalal meeleavaldused
description: Sestsaati kui Hamas 2007. aastal Gazas võimu haaras, on selline pahameele väljendamine, nagu võis näha möödunud nädalal, harukordne. Üksikud meeleavaldused on rühmitus aastate jooksul vägivaldselt laiali peksnud, häälekamad kriitikud kongi pistnud, neid piinanud või lihtsalt maha löönud.
title_translated: Not satisfied with Hamas: Gaza took place last week
description_translated: From since, in Hamas, in 2007, Gaza seized power, the expression of resentment, as it could have been seen last week, is extraordinary. Single demonstrations have been violently defeated the group over the years, and the loud critics have put, tortured or simply hit them.

title: Kristin Lätt ja mänedžer lõpetasid eduka koostöö. Vutt: „Mingit draamat siit otsida ei ole!“

title_translated: Kristin Lätt and manager finished successful cooperation. Quail: "There is no drama here!"
description_translated: Kristin Lätt and Manager Matthias Vutt, the world's best female chain golf, finished a year and a half on Monday.

title: HITLERI MEREKUURORT: hiiglaslik hoonekompleks Prora pidi suutma majutada 20 000 inimest
description: 1930. aastate keskpaigas tekkis natsidel mõte rajada Läänemere äärde seninägematu kuurort – 4,5 kilomeetrile ulatuv hoonekompleks Prora. Projekti realiseerimisest oli huvitatud ka Adolf Hitler isiklikult. Maailma suurima puhkekeskuse rajamise plaan oli lennukas, ent II maailmasõja puhkemine pani ehitustöö seisma ning kompleksi hakati kasutama hoopis teisel otstarbel.
title_translated: Hitler's Sea Resort: The giant building complex Prora had to be able to accommodate 20,000 people
description_translated: In the mid -1930s, the Nazis came up with the idea of ​​building an unprecedented resort along the Baltic Sea - Prora, a building complex of 4.5 kilometers. Adolf Hitler was also interested in the realization of the project personally. The plan to build the world's largest recreation center was flying, but the outbreak of World War II made the construction work and the complex began to be used for a different purpose.

title: Tippjalgpalli uus moeröögatus: kofeiininäts! Mida see annab ja millised on ohud?
description: Kui Jamie Vardy aitas Leicester City Inglismaa meistriks Red Bulli toel, siis tänapäeval on kofeiinitarbimine muutunud tippjalgpallis lausa trendiks. Igaühele parima tuvastamiseks on suurde mängu kaasatud ka toitumis- ja unespetsialistid.
title_translated: Top football new fashion rush: Caffeine! What does it give and what are the dangers?
description_translated: While Jamie Vardy helped Leicester City as England champion with the support of Red Bull, today caffeine consumption has become a trend in top football. Nutrition and dream specialists are also involved in the big game to identify the best for everyone.

description: Tantsumuusika fännidel on põhjust taaskord rõõmustada – 22. augustil astub Tallinna lauluväljakul lavale maailmakuulus Norra DJ ja produtsent Alan Walker. Ikoonilise hitiga „Faded“ tuntuks saanud artist liitub juba varem välja kuulutatud Steve Aokiga.
title_translated: Where is it, there will be more! Together with Steve Aok, another superstar performs in Tallinn
description_translated: Dance music fans have a reason to rejoice again - on August 22, the world -famous Norwegian DJ and producer Alan Walker will perform on the Tallinn Song Festival Grounds. The artist, known for the "Faded" iconic hit, is joining Steve Aok, who has already been announced.

description_translated: The Kuressaare Police Station, in cooperation with the Saaremaa rural municipality, organized the complex training of maritime safety "The Sea and Me!" For the sixth time.

title: TÄNUVÄÄRT ROOG | Ahjupada sealiha ja seentega
description: Ahjus haudunud pajaroog on jahedal ajal tänuväärt roog. Soojendab ja toidab terve pere ning on maitsev ka järgmisel päeval soojendatult. Keeda kõrvale odrakruupe − see on mõnus ja teistmoodi lisand kartuli või riisi asemel.
title_translated: Thankful dish Oven pad with pork and mushrooms
description_translated: The casserole that is hatched in the oven is a thankful dish in cool times. Heats and nourishes the whole family and is delicious the next day warmed up. Boil the barley cakes - it's a nice and different addition to potatoes or rice.

title: KEVADINE MOEHITT: lehmamuster passib selga ja jalga
description: Nägemist, uhked leopardid, vonklevad maod, siredad sebrad! Lehmanahamuster on asunud võidukäigule, tuues kevadmoodi kelmikat ja kõditavat vaheldust.
title_translated: Spring Meehtt: A cow pattern passes on back and leg
description_translated: Seeing, gorgeous leopards, sneaking snakes, sirbing zebras! The cowhide pattern has begun to triumph, bringing spring -like to sly and tickling.

title: Üks tulekahju teise järel: mis on Jaapani GP-l lahti?!
description: Vormel 1 hooaja kolmas etapp Jaapanis on paraku jõudnud pealkirjadesse spordivälistel põhjustel, kui vabatreeningutel ja kvalifikatsioonis pidi võistlus seisma lausa viiel korral tulekahjude tõttu.
title_translated: One fire after another: what is the Japanese GP?!
description_translated: Unfortunately, the third stage of the Formula 1 season in Japan has entered the headlines for sports reasons when free training and qualifications had to stand up as many as five times due to fires.

title: LUSTLIK GALERII | Ambla jõel seiklesid isetehtud paatidega parvetajad
description: Laupäeva hommikul toimus Järvamaal juba kümnendat korda Käravete Lohv, kus võeti mõõtu isetehtud veesõidukitega seiklusrikkal paadimatkal mööda Ambla jõge. Jõele läks pea kakskümmend veesõidukit.
title_translated: Lusty Gallery On the Ambla River, rafts with homemade boats were adventured
description_translated: On Saturday morning, Käravete's loop was held in Järva County for the tenth time, which was measured on the Ambla River on an adventurous boat trip with homemade craft. Twenty craft went to the river.

title: Küsitlus ⟩ Saaremaa – kas turvaline paik või pigem siiski mitte?
description: Saaremaad peetakse turvaliseks kohaks, ent siingi tuleb ette vägivalda ja vargusi. Uurisime Saaremaa inimestelt, kui turvaliselt nad end siin elades tunnevad.
title_translated: Survey⟩ Saaremaa - a safe place or rather not?
description_translated: Saaremaa is considered a safe place, but here too, violence and theft. We researched from the people of Saaremaa how safe they were living here.

title: AVARII ⟩ Auto sõitis läbi poe seina
description: Politsei- ja piirivalve ameti andmetel toimus täna Kuressaares avarii kus vanem meesterahvas sõitis läbi poe klaasseina.
title_translated: The accident⟩ car drove through the store wall
description_translated: According to the Police and Border Guard Agency, there was an accident in Kuressaare today where an older man drove through a glass wall.

title: GALERII | „Need, kes lahkusid, pole saavutanud midagi!“ Helme lõi kongressil rusikaga lauale
description: Laupäeval Estonia kontserdisaalis toimub EKRE kongress. Üritus toob kokku partei liikmed üle kogu Eesti, et arutada tulevikupoliitikat ja valida uus juhtkond.
title_translated: Gallery "Those who left have achieved anything!" Helme created a fist at the congress on the table
description_translated: The EKRE Congress will take place in the Estonia Concert Hall on Saturday. The event brings together members of the party all over Estonia to discuss the future policy and to choose a new leadership.

title: Lussu külas sõitsid maasturid eramaale ja tekitasid kahju elektrilevile
description: Saaremaal, Lussu külas, toimus täna intsident, kus nelja maasturiga liikunud isikud sisenesid loata eramaale ning kahjustasid liinialust ala.
title_translated: In Lussu village, SUVs traveled to private land and caused damage to Elektrilevi
description_translated: In Saaremaa, Lussu village, there was an incident today, where four SUVs entered private land and damaged the area area.

title: 3:2 ⟩ FC Kuressaare U21 pidas lõpuni vastu ja sai teenitud kolm punkti
description: FC Kuressaare U21 teenis pühapäeval väärtusliku 3:2 võidu JK Tabasalu üle, näidates head võitlusvaimu ning distsiplineeritud mängu mõlemal poolajal.
title_translated: 3: 2⟩ FC Kuressaare U21 ended up and received three points earned
description_translated: FC Kuressaare U21 earned a valuable 3: 2 victory over JK Tabasalu on Sunday, showing a good fighting spirit and a disciplined game in both sides.

title: VIDEO ⟩ Sander Erdel ehitab oma koduses töökojas metallijääkidest vingeid laualampe
description: Ühel ilusal päeval sattusin Aula-Vintri külla ja leidsin Andruse talu hoovist ettevõtte Ermetal. Tegemist on väikese pereettevõttega, kus peaasjalikult tegeletakse kõikvõimaliku metallitööga. Eriti lahedad näevad välja metallijääkidest valmistatud laualambid.
title_translated: Video⟩ Sander Erdel builds awesome table lamps from metal residues in his home workshop
description_translated: On one beautiful day I came across a lobby-Vintri village and found the company Ermetal in the yard of Andrus Farm. It is a small family business where all kinds of metal work is done mainly. Table lamps made of metal residues look particularly cool.

title: Kelmide uus sihtmärk: kontserdipiletid! Üks vale klikk ja raha on läinud
description: Millised riskid võivad kaasneda internetis üritustele piletite ostmisega eraisiku käest? „Mõni inimene leiab soodsa pileti veebilehelt, mis on kelmide tehtud, ning andmeid sisestades kaotab raha ilma pileteid saamata,“ hoiatab politsei menetlustalituse juht Margus Kaudne.
title_translated: New Target Target: Concert tickets! One wrong click and money has gone
description_translated: What can be the risks of buying tickets for events on the Internet? "Some people find a favorable ticket on the website made by scams, and when you enter data, you will lose money without receiving tickets," warns Margus Ruudu, head of the police.

title: SAAREMAA VANIM ETTEVÕTE ⟩ Arvelauast keskarvutini: kas häkker on kõvem kui tavaline hiir?
description: Saaremaa tarbijate ühistu IT-juht Mehis Väin on ettevõttes töötanud kokku ligi neli aastakümmet ja olnud isiklikult osaline kaubanduses asetleidnud tormilises infotehnoloogilises arengus.
title_translated: Saaremaa's oldest company⟩ from the billboard to central computer: is the hacker harder than a regular mouse?
description_translated: Mehis Väin, IT Manager of the Saaremaa Consumers' Association, has worked in the company for nearly four decades and has been personally involved in the stormy information technology development in trade.

title: VIDEO | Miss Raplamaa tiitli pälvinud Helina Pajuväli: mul polnudki üldse plaanis võistlusel osaleda
description: Laupäeva õhtul krooniti kümne kaunitari seast Miss Raplamaaks 17aastane Heleri Pajuväli. „Ma olen täiesti sõnatu,“ paljastas ilukonkursi võitja pärast auhinnatseremooniat. Enda sõnul liitus ta missivõistlusega täiesti juhuslikult.
title_translated: Video | Helina Pajeväli, who has won the title of Miss Raplamaa: I had no plans to participate in the competition at all
description_translated: On Saturday evening, 17 -year -old Heleri Pajuväli was crowned Miss Raplamaa. "I'm completely speechless," the winner of the beauty competition revealed after the award ceremony. According to him, he joined the missions completely by accident.

title: SAARLANE ⟩ Gert Lutter õpib ise ja õpetab teisi
description: Kuressaare Nooruse kooliga on Gert Lutter seotud juba lapsepõlvest saati. Lõpetanud selles majas tegutsenud Kuressaare gümnaasiumi, sai ta samas koolis üsna kohe tööd arvutiõpetajana ja IT-valdkonnas. Praegu õpetab Gert Nooruse koolis lastele eesti keelt ja kirjandust, õpib ülikoolis õpetajaks, tegutseb fotograafina ja harrastab rahvatantsu.
title_translated: Islander⟩ Gert Lutter learns himself and teaches others
description_translated: Gert Lutter has been involved with Kuressaare Noorus School since childhood. After graduating from Kuressaare Gymnasium in this house, he immediately received a job as a computer teacher and IT at the same school. Currently, Gert is teaching Estonian and literature for children, studying as a teacher at the university, acting as a photographer and practicing folk dance.

title: CHERCHEZ LA FEMME! Beckhamite kaks poega läksid naise pärast raksu
description: TMZ.comi andmeil toimuvad Victoria ja David Beckhami peres tõelised draamad – kuulsa paari kolmest pojast kaks on nii tõsiselt tülli pööranud, et keelduvad teineteisega rääkimast.
title_translated: Cherchez la Femme! Beckham's two sons went to the woman's hoart
description_translated: According to TMZ.COM, true dramas take place in the family of Victoria and David Beckham - two of the three sons of the famous pair have been so seriously quarreled that they refuse to talk to each other.

title: „Mis ma vanainimene teen siis, ootan voodis selili surma või?“ 80aastane lillekasvataja toob kevade Tartusse
description: „Lillesibulaid eriti keegi osta ei taha ja siis ma mõtlesin, et kingin Eesti Rahva Muuseumile, sealne ümbrus on nii kole,“ räägib eluaegne lillekasvataja Kalle Nurm.
title_translated: "What am I going to do then, I look forward to the death of my back in bed or?" An 80 -year -old flower breeder brings spring to Tartu
description_translated: "Nobody wants to buy flower bulbs in particular, and then I thought I would give me to the Estonian National Museum, the surroundings are so ugly," says life -time flower farmer Kalle Nurm.

title: VIDEO | Mourinho jääb Mourinhoks! Vastastreenerile tehtud ninaprääks tõi kaks karistust
description: Parasjagu Istanbuli Fenerbahces töötav portugallasest jalgpallitreener Jose Mourinho lasi taas valla enda vastuolulisema poole. Ta otsustas raevuhoos pigistada vastaste juhendaja nina ning teenis säärase käitumise eest pika mängukeelu ja rahatrahvi.
title_translated: Video | Mourinho stays in Mourinho! The nose made to the opponent brought two sentences
description_translated: Jose Mourinho, a Portuguese football coach working in Istanbul's Fenerbahces, once again shot the municipality himself. He decided to squeeze his opponent's nose in the rage and earned a long game ban and a fine for such behavior.

title: HINNETELEHT ⟩ Kuidas hindasid kohalikud laskesuusatähed oma hooaega?
description: Postimees pöördus MK-sarjas ning MMil võistelnud Eesti laskesuusatajate poole, et kurja ajakirjaniku asemel annaks nad ise enda möödunud hooajale hinde.
title_translated: Grade sheet⟩ How did the local biathlon stars evaluate their season?
description_translated: Postimees turned to the Estonian biathlon who competed in the MK series and the World Championships in the World Championships to give their own rates instead of the evil journalist.

title: „Ma ei taha jääda juhtmete ja voolikute külge.“ Elulõpu tahteavaldus on võimalus, mitte kohustus
description: Kui hiljuti esitleti sotsiaalministeeriumis patsiendi elulõpu tahteavalduse eelnõu, rõhutasid kõik eksperdid, et see ei tähenda eutanaasiat või abistatud suitsiidi. Ometi on veel pikk tee käia, et kõik mõistaksid nii olulise otsuse olemust. „Alati pole küsimus, kui palju päevi ja hetki on inimesele antud, vaid milline on nende hetkede kvaliteet,“ kõneles prof Ruth Kalda Eesti arstide päevadel.
title_translated: "I don't want to stick to the wires and hoses." A statement of end of life is an opportunity, not an obligation
description_translated: When a draft end of a patient's application for life was recently presented in the Ministry of Social Affairs, all experts emphasized that this does not mean euthanasia or assisted suicide. However, there is still a long way to go for everyone to understand the nature of such an important decision. "It is not always a question of how many days and moments have been given to a person, but what the quality of those moments is," Prof Ruth Kalda said at the Estonian Doctor Days.

title: Plahvatuskindel bassein ja mänguplats: Soome näitab ärevil Euroopale teed varjendisüsteemi rajamiseks
description: Ujumisbasseinid, mänguväljakud ja lõbustuspargid: Soome maa-alused rajatised, mida vajadusel saab kasutada pommivarjendina, on saanud eeskujuks Euroopale, mis püüab valmistuda Vene agressiooni tõttu esile kerkinud ohtudeks.
title_translated: Explosive Pool and Playground: Finland shows anxiety for Europe to build a shelter system
description_translated: Swimming pools, playgrounds and amusement parks: Finnish underground facilities, which can be used as a bomb shelter if necessary, have become an example for Europe, which seeks to prepare for the dangers of rising threats due to Russian aggression.

title: NATO peasekretär: kaitsekulutusi on vaja kindlasti tõsta
description: Kui liikmesriigid hoiaksid oma kaitsekulutused vaid kahe protsendi juures sisemajanduse kogutoodangust, siis ei suudaks NATO end järgmise kolme kuni viie aasta jooksul kaitsta, hoiatas pühapäeval peasekretär Mark Rutte, kelle sõnu edastasid uudistekanalid Ukrinform ja CBS News.
title_translated: NATO Secretary -General: Defense spending is definitely needed to increase
description_translated: If Member States kept their defense spending at only two percent of gross domestic product, NATO would not be able to defend itself for the next three to five years, Sunday Secretary General Mark Rutte warned, whose words were broadcast by Ukrinform and CBS News.

title: BLOGI ⟩ 1139. sõjapäev Ukrainas: Vene vägede edenemine on viie kuu jooksul aeglustunud
description: 2022. aasta 24. veebruaril alustas Venemaa režiimi juht Vladimir Putin sissetungi Ukrainasse. Pärast seda, kui Ukraina lõi tagasi pealetungi Kiievile, on lahingute kese kandunud Ida- ja Lõuna-Ukrainasse ning mullu augustis tungisid Ukraina üksused ka Venemaa territooriumile. Postimees kajastab 1139. sõjapäeva sündmusi allolevas blogis.
title_translated: Blog⟩ 1139. War Day in Ukraine: The progress of Russian troops has slowed in five months
description_translated: On February 24, 2022, Vladimir Putin, the head of the Russian regime, began an invasion of Ukraine. After Ukraine has returned to Kiev, the center of the battles has been transferred to eastern and southern Ukraine, and in August last year Ukrainian units also invaded Russian territory. Postimees reflects 1139 events in the blog below.

title: Ukraina asekaitseministrid ja Rheinmetalli delegatsioon arutasid ühisprojekte
description: Ukraina asekaitseministrid Valeri Tšurkin ja Serhi Bojev pidasid pühapäeval arutelusid Saksa ettevõtte Rheinmetall Landsystem GmbH delegatsiooniga, mida juhtis selle tegevjuht Björn Bernhard, vahendas kaitseministeeriumi andmeid uudistekanal Ukrinform.
title_translated: Ministers of Ukraine Deputy Defense and Rhein Metal Delegation discussed joint projects
description_translated: Deputy Ministers of Ukraine Valeri Churkin and Serhi Bojev held discussions on Sunday with a delegation by the German company Rheinmetall Landsystem GmbH, led by its CEO Björn Bernhard.

title: Zelenskõi käskis rünnakute ägenedes tõhustada koostööd partneritega
description: Ukraina president Volodõmõr Zelenskõi tegi pühapäeval kaitseminister Rustem Umerovile ja välisminister välisminister Andri Sõbihale ülesandeks tihendada koostööd rahvusvaheliste partneritega ning valmistada ette uus Ramsteini formaadis kohtumine, vahendas uudistekanal Ukrinform.
title_translated: Zelenskyi commanded to improve cooperation with partners as the attacks worsen
description_translated: On Sunday, the President of Ukraine Volodymyr Zelenski did the Defense Minister Rustem Umerov and Foreign Minister Andri Sõbiha, Foreign Minister Andri Sõbiha, to intensify cooperation with international partners and to prepare a new meeting in Ramstein format.

title: Trumpi nõunik Burns käis pärast rünnakut Krõvõi Rihis
description: USA presidendi Donald Trumpi lähedane liitlane ja nõunik pastor Mark Burns külastas Venemaa ohvriterohke raketilöögi järel Krõvõi Rihi ning kutsus rahvusvahelist üldsust üles seisma Ukrainaga ja mõistma hukka rünnaku jõhkruse, vahendas uudistekanal Ukrinform.
title_translated: Trump Advisor Burns went to Krõ butter after the attack
description_translated: Pastor Mark Burns, a close ally and advisor to US President Donald Trump, visited Krõ butter after a Russian victim -off rocket kick and called for the international public to stand up with Ukraine and condemn the brutal attack, reported by Ukrinform.

title: USA avaldas Ukrainale kaastunnet seoses Krõvõi Rihi rünnakuga
description: Ühendriikide suursaadik Ukrainas Bridget Brink avaldas pühapäeval ukrainlastele kaastunnet Krõvõi Rihi rünnakuga seoses ja nimetas rünnaku korraldajaks otseselt Venemaad.
title_translated: The US expressed his condolences to Ukraine in relation to Krõ or Rih's attack
description_translated: United States Ambassador to Ukraine Bridget Brink expressed his condolences to the Ukrainians on Sunday with regard to the attack on Krõ or Rih and was directly appointed by Russia as the attack organizer.

title: New Yorgis said noarünnakus haavata naine ja kolm last
description: New Yorgis pühapäeval aset leidnud noarünnakus said tõsiselt vigastada kolm last ja naine, teatas kohalik meedia, sealhulgas uudistekanal NBC.
title_translated: In New York, a woman and three children were wounded in a knife attack
description_translated: Three children and a woman were seriously injured in a knit attack in New York on Sunday, local media, including NBC news channel, said.

title: Sportlase suguühtele sundimises süüdistatav Mehis Viru: kõik suhted olid vastastikused
description: Tartu maakohtu ette astuv kergejõustikutreener Mehis Viru, kellele heidetakse ette treenitava sportlase tahtevastasesse seksuaalvahekorda sundimises, kinnitab kaitsja vahendusel, et süüdistus ei ole põhjendatud – tal pole kunagi olnud kellegagi tahtevastast intiimsuhet.
title_translated: Mehis Viru, accused of compelling athlete's sexual intercourse: All relationships were reciprocal
description_translated: Athletics trainer Mehis Viru, who performs in front of the Tartu County Court, who is accused of forcing the sexual intercourse of a trained athlete, confirms through the lawyer that the accusation has not been justified - he has never had an intimate relationship with anyone.

title_translated: Digiht⟩ Voice of the Islands April 8, 2025

title: PÄEVAPILT ⟩ Valvepostil
description: Ootame teie pilte koos selgitava allkirjaga aadres­sil paevapilt@­saartehaal.ee.

While in the beginning of the year investors enjoyed an optimism wave of Optimism when Trump took office, the mood of the stock markets has now changed dramatically. Kalle Kose, the property manager of Luminor's Private Banking, explains why the situation has become critical and what investors need to be ready in the coming weeks.

title_translated: The Basketball Association started a procedure for Peep Pahv's alleged violence case
description_translated: The Estonian Basketball Association made an official statement about the alleged incident in the semi -finals of Saku II in the semi -finals of Saku II between Peep Pahvi, a Keila Coolbet doubles team coach and player Christopher Lenk.

title: VERISED MESINÄDALAD: Tšehhis tappis mees vahetult pärast pulmi oma abikaasa
description: Tšehhi politsei uurib riigi lääneosas Karlovy Vary maakonnas toimunud mõrva. Tolle juhtumi teeb aga mõneti ebatavaliseks asjaolu, et ohver ja tõenäoline kahtlusalune olid alles kaks päeva varem abiellunud...
title_translated: Bloody Honeymoon: In the Czech Republic, the man killed his husband just after the wedding
description_translated: The Czech police are investigating the murder in Karlovy Vary County in the western part of the country. However, this case is made somewhat unusual by the fact that the victim and the probable suspect had only been married two days earlier ...

title: Galerii ⟩ Abituriendid panid proovile oma eesti keele oskuse
description: Riigieksamite perioodi avas täna eesti keele eksam, mille tegemiseks oli end Saare maakonnast kirja pannud 233 eksaminandi.
title_translated: Gallery⟩ graduates tested their Estonian language skills
description_translated: Today, the Estonian language exam opened the Estonian language exam, which had written off 233 examiners in Saare County.

title: Kuressaare veevärgi 2024. aasta kahjum oli küll kümnendi väikseim, aga kasum on veel väga kaugel
description: Saaremaa vee- ja kanalisatsiooniettevõte AS Kuressaare Veevärk lõpetas 2024. aasta 374 000-eurose kahjumiga, mis on viimase kümne aasta väikseim miinus.
title_translated: The loss of Kuressaare Water Supply in 2024 was the smallest decade, but the profits are still very far away
description_translated: AS Kuressaare Veevärk, a water and sewerage company in Saaremaa, ended the loss of 374,000 euros in 2024, the smallest minus of the last decade.

title: KRIMI ⟩ Mees kägistas naist ja sotsiaalmaja elanik kolkis naabrimeest
description: „Alustasime 83 väärteomenetlust ja seitse kriminaalmenetlust. Kainenema paigutati möödunud nädalal viis meest," võttis möödunud nädala kokku Kuressaare politseijaoskonna rakendusekspert Matis Sikk.
title_translated: Crimea⟩ The man strangled the woman and the social house resident moved the neighbor
description_translated: "We started 83 misdemeanor proceedings and seven criminal proceedings. Five men were placed last week last week," Matis Sikk, the application expert of the Kuressaare Police Station last week.

title: Eesti rekordimees liigub MMi A-normi suunas
description: Mullu oktoobris Hispaaniasse harjutama läinud Eesti tippujuja Alex Ahtiainen maitseb tõhusa töö magusaid vilju: pühapäeva õhtul tuli ta mainekal Stockholmi võistlusel kolmandaks.
title_translated: The Estonian record holder is moving towards the World Cup A-standard
description_translated: Alex Ahtiainen, the top Estonian top manager who went to Spain in October last year, tastes the sweet fruits of an effective work: on Sunday evening he came third in the prestigious Stockholm competition.

title: Ruhnlased muretsevad transpordiühenduse tuleviku pärast
description: Ruhnu vallavalitsus muretseb väikesaare transpordiühenduse tuleviku pärast ja soovib teemat arutada taritsuminister Kuldar Leisiga.
title_translated: Ruhners are concerned about the future of transportation
description_translated: The Ruhnu rural municipality government is concerned about the future of the small island transport connection and wants to discuss the topic with Minister of Tari Kuldar Leis.

title: TIM BLUZI TOP | Šokeerivamad ja skandaalsemad stiilimuutused EFTA galal
description: Tänavune EFTA gala punane vaip võib täie õigusega kirjutada end ajalukku kui üks ekstravagantsemaid ja eksperimentaalsemaid. Jagus nii leiba – õigemini popkorni – kui ka korralikku tsirkust. Kes rabas kõige julgema stiilimuutusega? Kes astus mugavustsoonist välja, et näidata esmaklassilist moemängu?
title_translated: Tim Bluz Top | More shocking and scandalous style changes at the EFTA gala
description_translated: This year's EFTA gala red carpet can be fully in history as one of the most extravagant and experimental. Both the bread - or rather popcorn - and a decent circus. Who struck the most daring style change? Who stepped out of the comfort zone to show first -class fashion play?

title: JUHTKIRI | Me lähme reisile – Artekki, kus kukuvad pommid
description: „Me läheme reisile – tasuta!“ See „Tujurikkuja“ klipp tekitas kümmekonna aasta eest kallil vana-aasta õhtul korraliku skandaali: kuidas saab küüditamise üle niimooidi irvitada?! Ja lõputiitrites oli naljaviskamine Venemaa võimude spondeerimise kohta!
title_translated: Editorial We're going on a trip - arteks where bombs fall
description_translated: "We're going on a trip - free!" This "moodbird" clip made a decent scandal on a dear New Year's Eve decade ago: how can you laugh at the deportation?! And in the final titles, there was a joke about spending the Russian authorities!

title: Leisi Kooli poisid võitsid Eesti koolide minivõrkpalliturniiri
description: 11. aprill toimus Kohila spordikeskuses Võrkpalli Miniliiga finaal, kus Leisi kooli poisid said Eesti koolide arvestuses esimese koha.
title_translated: The boys of the Leisi School won the mini -volleyball tournament of Estonian schools
description_translated: April 11 was the final of the Volleyball Ministry League at Kohila Sports Center, where the boys of the Leisi School took first place in Estonian schools.

title: USA tühistas sanktsioonid Orbáni mõjuvõimsale kabinetiülemale
description: USA tühistas sanktsioonid Ungari peaministri Viktor Orbáni mõjuvõimsale kabinetiülemale Antal Roganile, teatas eile Ühendriikide rahandusministeerium.
title_translated: The US canceled sanctions on Orbán's powerful cabinet chief
description_translated: The United States canceled sanctions on Hungarian Prime Minister Viktor Orbán's influential cabinet chief Antal Rogan, the US Ministry of Finance said yesterday.

title: BLOGI ⟩ 1148. sõjapäev Ukrainas: droonid põrutasid Sumõle rünnaku korraldanud üksust võõrustavasse linna
description: 2022. aasta 24. veebruaril alustas Venemaa režiimi juht Vladimir Putin sissetungi Ukrainasse. Pärast seda, kui Ukraina lõi tagasi pealetungi Kiievile, on lahingute kese kandunud Ida- ja Lõuna-Ukrainasse ning mullu augustis tungisid Ukraina üksused ka Venemaa territooriumile. Postimees kajastab 1148. sõjapäeva sündmusi allolevas blogis.
title_translated: Blog⟩ 1148. War Day in Ukraine: The drones shocked the unit that organized the Summe attack
description_translated: On February 24, 2022, Vladimir Putin, the head of the Russian regime, began an invasion of Ukraine. After Ukraine has returned to Kiev, the center of the battles has been transferred to eastern and southern Ukraine, and in August last year Ukrainian units also invaded Russian territory. Postimees reflects the 1148th war events on the blog below.

title: Rutte: Ukraina tee NATOsse on pöördumatu, kuid pole osa rahuleppest
description: Ukraina tee NATOsse on pöördumatu ja Washingtoni tippkohtumise järel pole miski muutunud, kuid alliansi liikmesus ei saa olema osa rahukokkuleppest, ütles eile NATO peasekretär Mark Rutte.
title_translated: Rutte: Ukrainian road to NATO is irreversible but is not part of a peace agreement
description_translated: The Ukrainian road to NATO is irreversible and nothing has changed after the Washington Summit, but the Alliance's membership will not be part of the peace agreement, said NATO Secretary General Mark Rute.

title: Ühe eesti interpreedi südame­tunnistuse asi võiks olla igal võimalusel Tubinat mängida
description: Sõjast on tänasel päeval kujunenud meie igapäevane reaalsus, millest mitte keegi puutumata pole jäänud. Kuid sõda käis ka 1944. aastal, kui Sergei Prokofjev kirjutas oma monumentaalse 8. sonaadi, nn kolmanda sõjasonaadi, mis üle pika aja esimest korda ka Tallinnas ettekandele tuleb, ning seda koos Tubina loominguga – heliloojaga, keda sõda samuti otseselt mõjutas.
title_translated: A thing of one Estonian interpreter conscience could be to play Tubin whenever possible
description_translated: The war today has become our daily reality that no one has left untouched. But there was a war in 1944, when Sergei Prokofiev wrote his monumental 8th sonata, the so -called third war sonate, which will be presented for the first time in Tallinn for a long time, with Tubin's creations - composer, who was also directly influenced by the war.

title: Arhitekt joonistab, et mitte kibestuda
description: Tegelikult võib Ott Kadariku näituse peal­kirja võtta ka kui selle sisu kokku­võtet, sest välja­paneku üles­ehituses on mitu suunda: Jaapanis joonistatud skitsid, peast loodud sega­tehnikas arhitektuuri­vaated, arhitektuursed lõiked ja mäluruumid (põiked lapsepõlve).
title_translated: The architect draws not to become bitter
description_translated: In fact, the title of Ott Kadarik's exhibition can also be taken as a summary of its contents, as there are several directions in the exhibition structure: skittes drawn in Japan, mixed architectural views, architectural cuts and memory rooms (cross -childhood).

title: Nagu maast leitud: Eesti võib saada kaitsevaldkonda ligi miljard eurot juurde - ühe agaga
description: Euroopa Liidus soovitakse veel sel aastal muuta raha­jagamise kord senisele täiesti vastu­pidiseks, nii et Eestil on nüüd kasulik senise euroraha jagamisega pausi pidada.

description_translated: In the European Union, it is still aimed to make the money sharing procedure quite the opposite this year, so that Estonia is now useful to break the euro money so far.

title: Ohtlikud ja keelatud ained toidulisandites: Eesti eksperdid selgitavad, kuidas neid vältida
description: Värske uuring näitab, et iga kolmas Austraalias veebis müüdav toidulisand sisaldas keelatud aineid. Samuti on avaldatud uuringuid USAs müüdavate tervist ohustavate toidulisandite kohta. Kuid kuidas on toidulisanditega lood Eestis? Eksperdid selgitasid, millele toidulisandeid internetiavarustes ostes tähelepanu pöörata, et loodetud positiivse mõju asemel poleks tulemuseks rikutud tervis.​
title_translated: Dangerous and prohibited substances in dietary supplements: Estonian experts explain how to avoid them
description_translated: A recent study shows that every third of the dietary supplement sold in Australia contained prohibited substances. Surveys have also been published on nutritional supplements that threaten the health of the US. But what about dietary supplements in Estonia? Experts explained what supplements to pay attention to when buying on the Internet so that instead of the expected positive effects, the result would not result in violated health.

title: ÜLEVAADE ⟩ Euroopa üritab Sudaani humanitaarkatastroofi veenirega kustutada
description: Sudaani kodusõja puhkemise teisel aastapäeval kogunes eile Ühendkuningriigi eestvedamisel Londonis käputäis Euroopa ning Aafrika ja Lähis-Ida riikide esindajaid, otsimaks võimalusi leevendada maailma suurima humanitaarkatastroofi vallandanud taplust. Põhimõtteliste otsusteni ei jõutud, täbaral kombel polnud kumbagi sõja osalist – Sudaani valitsusvägesid ja paramilitaarset rühmitust Kiirtoetusjõud (RSF) – kohtumisele kutsutud.
title_translated: Overview⟩ Europe is trying to delete Sudan's humanitarian disaster with a vein
description_translated: On the second anniversary of the Sudanese Civil War, a handful of Europe and Africa and the Middle East gathered yesterday under the leadership of the United Kingdom to seek opportunities to mitigate the world's largest humanitarian disaster. There was no fundamental decisions, the bluntly, neither of the war - the Sudanese government forces and the paramilitary group of fast support forces (RSF) - were invited to the meeting.

title: POSTIMEES UKRAINAS ⟩ Võtmeküsimus rindel: kes peatab esimesena vastase droonid?
description: Kes loob esimesena kaitsesüsteemi droonide vastu, saab mõneks ajaks suure eelise. Ukrainlaste brigaadis Azov on loodud lahendus, mis osaliselt seda suudab.
title_translated: Postimees in Ukraine⟩ Key issue on the front: Who stops the opponent's drones first?
description_translated: Anyone who creates a defense system against drones will get a big advantage for a while. In the Ukrainian brigade Azov is a solution that can partly can.
